liquidbounce.generic.notifyDeveloper: Check your game log and notify us.
liquidbounce.commandManager.commandTakes: Command does not take any arguments.
liquidbounce.command.bind.description: Binds a module to a key.
liquidbounce.command.bind.parameter.name: Name of the module.
Key to which the module should be bound.
liquidbounce.command.binds.description: Binds a module to a key.
liquidbounce.command.binds.subcommand.ad: Key to which the module should be bound.
liquidbounce.command.binds.subcommand.re: Module is not bound to any key.
liquidbounce.command.binds.subcommand.li: The page number you have entered exceeds the number of available pages, it may at most be %d.
liquidbounce.command.client.description: Allows you to manage the client.
liquidbounce.command.friend.description: Allows you to manage your friends list.
liquidbounce.command.friend.subcommand.a: Adds a name to the friend list.
%s is already on the friend list.
%s was successfully added to the friend list.
%s was successfully added to the friend list as %s.
liquidbounce.command.friend.subcommand.r: Removes a friend from the friends list.
%s was not on the friend list.
%s was successfully removed from the friend list.
liquidbounce.command.friend.subcommand.a: %s is not on your friend list.
liquidbounce.command.help.result.pageNum: The page number you have entered exceeds the number of available pages, it may at most be %d.
liquidbounce.command.hide.subcommand.lis: The page number you have entered exceeds the number of available pages, it may at most be %d
liquidbounce.command.panic.parameter.cat: Only disables modules in a specific category.
liquidbounce.command.give.result.noEmpty: There are no empty slots in your inventory.
liquidbounce.command.rename.result.mustH: You are not holding an item!
liquidbounce.command.skull.description: Gives yourself the skull of a specific player.
liquidbounce.command.skull.result.noEmpt: There are no empty slots in your inventory.
liquidbounce.command.position.descriptio: Copies your current coordinates to the clipboard.
liquidbounce.command.username.descriptio: Copies your username to the clipboard.
liquidbounce.command.value.description: Allows you to change a value
liquidbounce.command.remoteview.descript: Allows you to view the perspective of another player.
liquidbounce.command.remoteview.subcomma: You are now viewing the perspective of %s.
To stop remote viewing %s, execute the command ".rv off"
You are not remote viewing anyone.
liquidbounce.command.xray.description: Allows you to see ores through walls.
liquidbounce.command.xray.subcommand.add: Adds a block to render from the list.
Block named %s is already in the render list.
Block named %s has been added to render list.
liquidbounce.command.xray.subcommand.rem: Removes a block to render from the list.
Block named %s is not in the render list.
Block named %s has been removed from render list.
liquidbounce.command.xray.subcommand.lis: Shows a list of rendered blocks.
The page number you have entered exceeds the number of available pages, it may at most be %d
liquidbounce.command.xray.subcommand.cle: Clears the list of rendered blocks.
liquidbounce.module.autoArmor.value.dela: Time to wait between equipping multiple items.
liquidbounce.module.autoArmor.value.inv_: Whether the an opened inventory is required.
liquidbounce.module.autoArmor.value.simu: Whether opening the inventory should be simulated server-side.
liquidbounce.module.autoArmor.value.no_m: Whether item dragging should be simulated.
liquidbounce.module.autoArmor.value.hotb: Whether items should be equipped from the hotbar.
liquidbounce.module.autoBow.description: Automatically shoots an arrow when the bow is fully charged and allows faster shooting.
liquidbounce.module.autoLeave.descriptio: Automatically leaves the server whenever your health goes below the specified threshold.
liquidbounce.module.criticals.descriptio: Automatically deals critical damage everytime an entity is hit.
liquidbounce.module.hitbox.description: Enlarges the hitbox of other entities.
liquidbounce.module.superKnockback.descr: Increases knockback dealt to other entities.
liquidbounce.module.trigger.description: Automatically attacks when facing an enemy.
liquidbounce.module.velocity.description: Modifies the amount of velocity you take.
liquidbounce.module.abortBreaking.descri: Allows you to abort breaking without losing progress.
liquidbounce.module.bedWalk.description: Allows you to walk out of beds while sleeping.
liquidbounce.module.clip.description: Allows you to clip through blocks.
liquidbounce.module.damage.description: Deals the specified amount of damage to yourself.
liquidbounce.module.disabler.description: Disables either a specific AntiCheat or server.
liquidbounce.module.forceUnicodeChat.des: Translates all chat messages you send to Unicode.
liquidbounce.module.moreCarry.descriptio: Allows you to store additional items in your crafting slots (only works in multiplayer).
liquidbounce.module.noPitchLimit.descrip: Allows you to rotate your head beyond the regular pitch limit.
liquidbounce.module.pingSpoof.descriptio: Spoofs your ping to a specified value.
liquidbounce.module.plugins.description: Allows you to see a server's plugins.
liquidbounce.module.portalMenu.descripti: Allows you to open menus while standing inside a portal.
liquidbounce.module.vehicleOneHit.descri: Allows you to break any vehicle with a single hit.
liquidbounce.module.skinDerp.description: Makes your skin blink (requires a multi-layer skin).
liquidbounce.module.spammer.description: Spams the chat with specified messages.
liquidbounce.module.fly.description: Allows you to fly in survival mode.
liquidbounce.module.freeze.description: Allows you to freeze yourself in your current position without the server knowing.
liquidbounce.module.noClip.description: Allows you to fly through blocks.
liquidbounce.module.noClip.messages.setb: You have been set back by the server! Make sure you are already standing inside of a block.
liquidbounce.module.parkour.description: Automatically jumps at the very edge of a block.
liquidbounce.module.strafe.description: Allows you to strafe while being in mid-air.
liquidbounce.module.vehicleFly.descripti: Allows you to fly while riding an entity (eg. boat, horse).
liquidbounce.module.antiLevitation.descr: Prevents levitation and slow falling effects from affecting you.
liquidbounce.module.autoBreak.descriptio: Automatically breaks the block you are looking at.
liquidbounce.module.autoWalk.description: Automatically makes you walk in the direction you are facing.
liquidbounce.module.blink.description: Makes it look as if you were teleporting to other players.
liquidbounce.module.eagle.description: Automatically sneaks at the edge of a block (aka. FastBridge).
liquidbounce.module.noFall.description: Protects you from taking fall damage.
liquidbounce.module.antiBlind.descriptio: Protects you from potentially annoying screen effects that block your view.
liquidbounce.module.clickGUI.description: Shows you an easy-to-use menu to toggle and configure modules.
liquidbounce.module.fullBright.descripti: Makes the world a brighter place.
liquidbounce.module.hud.description: Shows an in-game overlay with various useful tools.
liquidbounce.module.itemEsp.description: Allows you to see dropped items through walls.
liquidbounce.module.nametags.description: Makes player name tags more visible and adds useful information.
liquidbounce.module.traces.description: Draws a line to every entity a certain radius.
liquidbounce.module.fastBreak.descriptio: Allows you to break blocks faster.
liquidbounce.module.fastPlace.descriptio: Allows you to place blocks faster.
liquidbounce.module.timer.description: Changes the speed the game is running at.
liquidbounce.module.friendClicker.descri: Allows you to make friends by clicking on them.
liquidbounce.module.friendClicker.addedF: %s was successfully added to the friend list.
liquidbounce.module.friendClicker.remove: %s was successfully removed from the friend list.
liquidbounce.module.autoGapple.descripti: Automatically eats apples whenever your health is low.
liquidbounce.module.autoSoup.description: Automatically eats soup whenever your health is low.
liquidbounce.module.badWifi.description: Holds back packets so as to prevent you from being hit by an enemy.
liquidbounce.module.aimbot.description: Automatically faces selected entities around you.
liquidbounce.module.antiReducedDebugInfo: Allows you to see extended debug information.
liquidbounce.module.ghostHand.descriptio: Allows you to interact with selected blocks through walls.
liquidbounce.module.notifier.description: Notifies you about all kinds of events.
liquidbounce.module.avoidHazards.descrip: Prevents you from walking into blocks that might be malicious.
liquidbounce.module.blockBounce.descript: Allows you to bounce higher on bouncy blocks.
liquidbounce.module.blockWalk.descriptio: Allows you to walk on non-fullblock blocks.
liquidbounce.module.bugUp.description: Automatically setbacks you after falling a certain distance.
liquidbounce.module.elytraFly.descriptio: Makes you fly faster on Elytra.
liquidbounce.module.inventoryMove.descri: Allows you to walk while an inventory is opened.
liquidbounce.module.liquidWalk.descripti: Allows you to walk on water.
liquidbounce.module.noPush.description: Prevents you from being pushed by other players.
liquidbounce.module.perfectHorseJump.des: Automatically jumps when the jump bar of a horse is fully filled up.
liquidbounce.module.safeWalk.description: Prevents you from falling down as if you were sneaking.
liquidbounce.module.step.description: Allows you to step up blocks.
liquidbounce.module.terrainSpeed.descrip: Allows you to move faster on specific surfaces.
liquidbounce.module.antiAfk.description: Prevents you from being kicked for AFK.
liquidbounce.module.autoFish.description: Automatically catches fish when using a rod.
liquidbounce.module.autoTotem.descriptio: Automatically places a totem in off-hand.
liquidbounce.module.chestStealer.descrip: Automatically steals all items from a chest.
liquidbounce.module.inventoryCleaner.des: Automatically throws away useless items and sorts them.
liquidbounce.module.blockEsp.description: Allows you to see selected blocks through walls.
liquidbounce.module.ESP.description: Allows you to see targets through walls.
liquidbounce.module.freeCam.description: Allows you to move out of your body.
liquidbounce.module.holeEsp.description: Detects and displays safe spots for Crystal PvP.
liquidbounce.module.mobOwners.descriptio: Shows you from which player a tamable entity or projectile belongs to.
liquidbounce.module.noHurtCam.descriptio: Disables the hurt cam effect when getting hurt.
liquidbounce.module.noSignRender.descrip: Prevents the sign text from being rendered.
liquidbounce.module.rotations.descriptio: Allows you to see server-sided rotations.
liquidbounce.module.storageEsp.descripti: Allows you to see chests, dispensers, etc. through walls.
liquidbounce.module.trajectories.descrip: Allows you to see where projectile items will land.
liquidbounce.module.autoTool.description: Automatically chooses the best tool in your inventory to mine a block.
liquidbounce.module.crystalAura.descript: Automatically places and destroys End Crystals.
liquidbounce.module.ignite.description: Automatically sets targets around you on fire.
liquidbounce.module.fastUse.description: Allows you to use items faster.
liquidbounce.module.noSlow.description: Cancels slowness effects caused by blocks and using items.
liquidbounce.module.sleepWalker.descript: Allows you to walk while sleeping, also makes your hitbox small.
liquidbounce.module.projectilePuncher.de: Shoots back incoming projectiles around you.
liquidbounce.module.autoPot.description: Automatically throws healing potions whenever your health is low.
liquidbounce.module.keepChatAfterDeath.d: Allows you to use the chat on the death screen.
liquidbounce.module.xray.description: Allows you to see ores through walls.
liquidbounce.module.noRotateSet.descript: Prevents the server from rotating your head.
liquidbounce.module.noSlowBreak.descript: Automatically adjusts breaking speed when in negatively affecting situations.
